description.plain:
Yellow Claw is a Dutch DJ group, specialized in trap music, hip hop, dubstep, electro house and moombahton.

The DJ duo currently consists of Jim Aasgier (Jim Taihuttu) and Nizzle (Nils Rondhuis). Former member of the group Bizzey (Leo Roelandschap) announced he was leaving the group to pursue a solo career in 2016.

They were formerly signed to Spinnin' Records, as well as Mad Decent. In 2014, Yellow Claw decided to erect their own label, called the Barong Family.

body.plain:
Yellow Claw is a Dutch DJ group, specialized in trap music, hip hop, dubstep, electro house and moombahton.

The DJ duo currently consists of Jim Aasgier (Jim Taihuttu) and Nizzle (Nils Rondhuis). Former member of the group Bizzey (Leo Roelandschap) announced he was leaving the group to pursue a solo career in 2016.

They were formerly signed to Spinnin' Records, as well as Mad Decent. In 2014, Yellow Claw decided to erect their own label, called the Barong Family.

songs.full_title: Love & War by Yellow Claw (Ft. Yade Lauren)
songs.title: Love & War

description.plain: This song tells the story of a toxic relationship. In the beginning, she fell in love fast. Then, later on in the relationship, it becomes very destructive. She finds that she doesn’t know who she fell in love with anymore.

songs.title_with_featured: Love & War (Yellow Claw G-Funk Remix) (Ft. Yade Lauren)

songs.lyrics:
16 ContributorsLove & War Lyrics[Verse 1: Yade Lauren]
Cut me through my skin
Through the heart, yeah, you went right in
I fell for every word you said

[Pre-Chorus: Yade Lauren]
I can't leave but I can't stay
I don't know, I don't know, I don't know
Why some things have to be this way

[Chorus: Yade Lauren]
We build it up to break it down
And then we're lost until we're found
And when we're high further from the ground
If all is fair in love and war
I can't do this anymore
If all is fair in love and war
I can't do this anymore

[Drop: Yade Lauren]
So unfair, so unfair
So unfair to me
So unfair, so unfair
So unfair to me

[Verse 2: Yade Lauren]
You told me from the start
Nothing could tear us apart
Now when I look I see a stranger
You might also like[Pre-Chorus: Yade Lauren]
I can't leave but I can't stay
I don't know, I don't know, I don't know
Why some things have to end this way

[Chorus: Yade Lauren]
We build it up to break it down
And then we're lost until we're found
And when we're high further from the ground
If all is fair in love and war
I can't do this anymore
If all is fair in love and war
I can't do this anymore

[Drop: Yade Lauren]
So unfair, so unfair
So unfair to me
So unfair, so unfair
So unfair to me6Embed

songs.lyrics:
11 ContributorsBoth of Us Lyrics[Verse 1]
I been waitin' for your comeback like the summer (ohh)
That kind of weather just brings me back to you (ooh)
Mmm, you the type of love I just can't get a hold of (ohh)
Say the word and I'll be racin' back to you, you

[Pre-Chorus]
You went bad, I got mad
I got back at you fast
Wish I could take it back
Is it too late now to take it back?

[Chorus]
I admit that I was wrong
It should've been you all along
Turns out I can't go on
But the blame's on both of us
It should've been you all along
But we always get it wrong
Turns out it was both our fault
'Cause the blame's on both, on the both of us

[Verse 2]
We were playin' games that set us up to lose (ohh)
And even now I wanna play those games again, yeah (ooh)
Mmm, this a battlefield and I'm callin' a truce (ohh)
I got my white flag wavin' high for you, yeah, ohhh
You might also like[Pre-Chorus]
You went bad, I got mad
I got back at you fast
Wish I could take it back
Is it too late now to take it back?

[Chorus]
I admit that I was wrong
It should've been you all along
Turns out I can't go on
But the blame's on both of us
It should've been you all along
But we always get it wrong
Turns out it was both our fault
'Cause the blame's on both, on the both of us

[Chorus/Outro]
I admit that I was wrong
It should've been you all along
Turns out I can't go on
But the blame's on both of us
It should've been you all along
But we always get it wrong
Turns out it was both our fault
'Cause the blame's on both, on the both of us2Embed
